Producer: Thierry Potok, Jorge Eduardo Ramírez, Jorge Ramírez Suárez
Production Co: MPN Cologne Film 3 UG, Beanca Films
Synopsis: An ambitious young Mexican travels to Germany to live with his friend's aunt but has to live on the streets when he cannot find her. He faces a bleak future until he meets Ruth, an 80-year-old retiree, and they develop a close bond.
Title: Good Day, Ramon
